action.primary: Restrains and holds to stop bleeding and vaginal discharge

indications: A variety of bleeding and other discharges from the Lower Jiao

action.primary: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, binds the Intestines and stops bleeding

indications: Dysenteric disorders, especially chronic cases or those marked by Blood
Stops diarrhea, dysentery and vaginal discharges

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with uterine bleeding due to Blood Stasis.
Contraindicated for those with early stages of dysenteric disorders with Exterior signs.

useCases: Irregular uterine bleeding due to Blood Heat
Irregular uterine bleeding due to Cold from Deficiency of the Chong and Ren channels
Vaginal discharge from Dampness due to Spleen Qi Deficiency
Intestinal bleeding and bleeding hemorrhoids due to Heat

notes: This herb can be used as a stand-alone herb in powder form dissolved in wine for incessant menstruation.
This herb treats bleeding hemorrhoids, red and white dysentery, hematemesis, hemoptysis, Blood Lin, metrorrhagia and red and white vaginal discharge.
The flowers can be decocted and used as a wash for vaginal pruritis and discharge.
Charred Flos Celosiae Ji Guan Hua Tan is less Cool but better able to astringe bleeding and vaginal discharge.
This herb has been shown to eliminate trichomonas vaginitis in ten minutes.
It has also been shown to kill parasites.
